Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Milquetoast \Milquetoast\ n. [From Caspar Milquetoast, a character in a cartoon strip by H. T. Webster, The Timid Soul (1935).] a timid, unassertive man or boy fearful of confrontation and easily manipulated and dominated.
Syn: sissy, pantywaist, pansy, milksop. [WordNet 1.5]
Milquetoast n : a timid man or boy considered childish or unassertive [syn: {sissy}, {pantywaist}, {pansy}, {milksop}]
